1249.question: How much important is the visual grounding in the learning of the multilingual representations?

7-Table1-1.png: The visual grounding is very important in the learning of the multilingual representations, as it significantly improves the performance across all subtasks.</s>

The visual grounding is quite important in the learning of the multilingual representations. This is evident from the fact that the 'ImageVec' method, which incorporates visual features, consistently outperforms the 'multSkip' method across all subtasks.</s>

1249.answer: performance is significantly degraded without pixel data
